subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Air Pollution
Environment
lead_paragraph: On the eve of the first Olympics held in China, the air was soupy and gray, with the air quality rating reaching 95, far short of clean air standards in the United States.
snippet: On the eve of the first Olympics held in China, the air was soupy and gray, with the air quality rating reaching 95, far short of clean air standards in the United States.
